Gnome women are female gnomes that may be found in the Gnome Stronghold. They may be pickpocketed with 75 Thieving; doing so yields 198.3 Thieving experience.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
  • 3 Pickpocketing

'''Gnome women''' are female gnomes that may be found in the [[Gnome Stronghold]]. They may be [[Theiving|pickpocketed]] with 75 [[Thieving]]; doing so yields 198.3 Thieving experience.
